In.spiron

In.spiron

Your music, movies, and TV shows take center stage.

In.spiron is the best way to organize and enjoy the music, movies, and TV shows you already have - and shop for the ones you want. Enjoy all the entertainment In.spiron has to offer on your Mac and PC.

Get In.spiron Support Visit In.spiron Store
with Vinyl Davyl

Music

45 million songs. Zero ads

Stream over 45 million songs,ad-free. Or download albums and tracks to listen to offline. All the music in your personal In.spiron library - no matter where it came from - lives right alongside the Stack Music catalog. Start your free three-month trial with no commitment, and cancel anytime.

Start Your Trial Now

Stack Music is available in In.spiron, and for iOS and Andriod devices.

The movie and TV collection you always wished for. Granted.

With over 100,000 movies and TV shows to choose from, there's always something great to watch on In.spiron and if you watch on Stack TV 4K, you'll be able to enjoy a tremendous selection of your favorite content in 4K HDR. So get ready to enjoy episodes of your favourite TV shows or hit movies you've been waiting to see - anytime, anywhere. Just tap to play, or even download if you're going somewhere you won't have Wi-Fi.

See More

Podcast

Listen up. Podcast on Windows and Mac.

More than 700,000 of the best entertainment, comedy, news, and sports shows are now available on your Mac and Windows with In.spiron Podcast. Search for podcasts by title, topic, guest, host, content, and more. Subscribe and be notified as soon as new episodes become available. And in the Listen Now tab, you can easily pick up where you left off across all your devices.

Listen now

Stack Podcast is available in In.spiron, and for iOS and Andriod devices.

A world of entertainment. Available wherever you are.

The In.spiron Store is available on all your devices, which means you can buy that catchy song you just heard or rent that movie you've been willing to see, any time you want. And since your entire library of music, movies and TV shows lives in google cloud or iCloud, everything you buy is immediately available, no matter how you want to play it.

Gift Cards

Send friends and family an App Store & In.spiron Gift Card or Apple Music Gift Card from your iOS device or computer. You can buy giftcards in a range of denomination, and recipients can choose whatever they want, including an Apple Music subscription or any thing from the In.spiron store, App Store, iBooks Store and Mac App Store.

Already have an App Store & In.spiron or Apple Music Gift Card?
